00045 // This should generate a core dump
00046 #ifdef HT_USE_ABORT
00047 #define HT_ABORT abort()
00048 #else
00049 #define HT_ABORT *((int *)0) = 1
00050 #endif
00051 
00052 // printf interface macro helper
00053 #define HT_LOG(_enabled_, _cat_, msg) do { \
00054   if (Logger::logger->_enabled_()) { \
00055     if (Logger::show_line_numbers) \
00056       Logger::logger->_cat_("(%s:%d) %s", __FILE__, __LINE__, msg); \
00057     else \
00058       Logger::logger->_cat_("%s", msg); \
00059   } \
00060 } while (0)
00061 
00062 #define HT_LOGF(_enabled_, _cat_, msg, ...) do { \
00063   if (Logger::logger->_enabled_()) { \
00064     if (Logger::show_line_numbers) \
00065       Logger::logger->_cat_("(%s:%d) " msg, __FILE__, __LINE__, __VA_ARGS__); \
00066     else \
00067       Logger::logger->_cat_(msg, __VA_ARGS__);  \
00068   } \
00069 } while (0)
00070 
00071 // stream interface macro helpers
00072 #define HT_OUT(_enabled_) do { if (Logger::logger->_enabled_()) { \
00073   char logbuf[1024]; \
00074   FixedOstream out(logbuf, sizeof(logbuf)); \
00075   if (Logger::show_line_numbers) \
00076     out <<"("<< __FILE__ <<':'<< __LINE__ <<") "; \
00077   out
00078 
00079 #define HT_OUT2(_enabled_) do { if (Logger::logger->_enabled_()) { \
00080   char logbuf[1024]; \
00081   FixedOstream out(logbuf, sizeof(logbuf)); \
00082   out << __func__; \
00083   if (Logger::show_line_numbers) \
00084     out << " ("<< __FILE__ <<':'<< __LINE__ <<")"; \
00085   out <<": "
00086 
00087 #define HT_END(_cat_) ""; Logger::logger->_cat_(out.str()); \
00088 } /* if enabled */ } while (0)
00089 
00090 #define HT_OUT_DISABLED do { if (0) {
00091 #define HT_END_DISABLED }} while (0)
00092 
00093 // Logging macros interface starts here
00094 #ifndef DISABLE_LOG_ALL
00095 
00096 #ifndef DISABLE_LOG_DEBUG
00097 
00098 #define HT_LOG_ENTER do { \
00099   if (Logger::logger->isDebugEnabled()) {\
00100     if (Logger::show_line_numbers) \
00101       Logger::logger->debug("(%s:%d) %s() ENTER", __FILE__, __LINE__, __func__); \
00102     else \
00103       Logger::logger->debug("%s() ENTER", __func__); \
00104   } \
00105 } while(0)
00106 
00107 #define HT_LOG_EXIT do { \
00108   if (Logger::logger->isDebugEnabled()) { \
00109     if (Logger::show_line_numbers) \
00110       Logger::logger->debug("(%s:%d) %s() EXIT", __FILE__, __LINE__, __func__); \
00111     else \
00112       Logger::logger->debug("%s() EXIT", __func__); \
00113   } \
00114 } while(0)

00116 #define HT_TRACE

00118 #define HT_DEBUG(msg) HT_LOG(isDebugEnabled, debug, msg)
00119 #define HT_DEBUGF(msg, ...) HT_LOGF(isDebugEnabled, debug, msg, __VA_ARGS__)
00120 #define HT_DEBUG_OUT HT_OUT2(isDebugEnabled)
00121 #define HT_DEBUG_END HT_END(debug)
00122 #else
00123 #define HT_LOG_ENTER
00124 #define HT_LOG_EXIT
00125 #define HT_DEBUG(msg)
00126 #define HT_DEBUGF(msg, ...)
00127 #define HT_DEBUG_OUT HT_OUT_DISABLED
00128 #define HT_DEBUG_END HT_END_DISABLED
00129 #endif

00215 #ifndef DISABLE_LOG_FATAL
00216 #define HT_FATAL(msg) do { \
00217   if (Logger::logger->isFatalEnabled()) { \
00218     if (Logger::show_line_numbers) \
00219       Logger::logger->fatal("(%s:%d) %s", __FILE__, __LINE__, msg); \
00220     else \
00221       Logger::logger->fatal("%s", msg); \
00222     HT_ABORT; \
00223   } \
00224 } while (0)
00225 #define HT_FATALF(msg, ...) do { \
00226   if (Logger::logger->isFatalEnabled()) { \
00227     if (Logger::show_line_numbers) \
00228       Logger::logger->fatal("(%s:%d) " msg, __FILE__, __LINE__, __VA_ARGS__); \
00229     else \
00230       Logger::logger->fatal(msg, __VA_ARGS__);  \
00231     HT_ABORT; \
00232   } \
00233 } while (0)
00234 #define HT_FATAL_OUT HT_OUT2(isFatalEnabled)
00235 #define HT_FATAL_END ""; Logger::logger->fatal(out.str()); HT_ABORT; \
00236 } /* if enabled */ } while (0)
00237 #define HT_EXPECT(_e_, _code_) do { if (_e_); else \
00238   HT_FATAL("failed expectation: " #_e_); \
00239 } while (0)
00240 #else
00241 #define HT_FATAL(msg)
00242 #define HT_FATALF(msg, ...)
00243 #define HT_FATAL_OUT HT_OUT_DISABLED
00244 #define HT_FATAL_END HT_END_DISABLED
00245 #define HT_EXPECT(_e_, _code_) do { if (_e_); else throw \
00246   Exception(_code_, "failed expectation: " #_e_); \
00247 } while (0)
00248 #endif
